campus-app /oauth/callback campus To enable all functions of the app, you need to grant access to your campus system on the next page.\n\nThis app does not save your password.\n\nAfter the setup you can:\n • View your calendar\n • Read and write messages\n • See details about your lectures\n • Chat with other students Your request can not be signed. You are not authorized. The communication with the server failed.

Extras Open Startup-Wizard The Startup-Wizard helps you in order to set the basic preferences for accessing the campus services and the layout of this App. Account Log out Disconnect from Campus Are you sure you want to log out? Logout failed Do you want to try again? Employee Mode Some unnecessary items for employees are hidden in this mode. Clear Cache Deletes all data which was downloaded by the Campus App and stored on your device. Are you sure you want to delete all data? Successfully cleared cache
Services Silent Service The device will be automatically put into silent mode during a lecture. Background Mode (Recommended) Content will automatically be updated once per day if you’re in your campus area. Background Mode activation Always WiFi only In-App-Tutorial Activates help mode for instruction on how to use this App.

Invalid time. Pick a time ranging from %d to %d.
Version: %1$s Send e-mail feedback Send feedback Feedback for Campus App
The Campus App is an open source project based on the TUM Campus App. The app can be used on smartphones and tablets and is available for Android.\n\nYou can reach us via the feedback form in the app or via email (dennis.benz@uos.de) if you have any special concerns or requests.
Query must be at least %d chars long Default Cafeteria Default Station Cafeteria Displays the cafeteria menu Shows you the departure times of public transport Shows information about your next lecture Reminds you when you have to pay your fees Shows your latest messages Advertises selected news Notifies you about new messages Chat Open card settings Always hide card To receive notifications on your phone you have to enable Wearable Display Geofencing
Opens Closes Closed
Eduroam Setup Setup eduroam Setup Eduroam now Password Don’t ask again Do you want to connect to eduroam now? Set up eduroam Allows you to easily set up eduroam Wi-Fi connection PIN-Lock To set up the wireless access a PIN lock is required.\nIf you don’t already use PIN lock you can set it up here. Enable PIN-Lock Data-Backup For safety reasons, the data backup must be disabled to avoid that your credentials are stored unencrypted on the Google servers.\nUnder ‘Backup & restore’ > ‘Back up my data’ to disable. Disable Data-Backup Eduroam successfully configured Eduroam refused Configuration failed!\nDo you have a manually created wifi profile? We cannot overwrite it so please delete it! Install certificate Certificate You have to install a CA-Root-certificate to enable secure connection with server. Just click ‘Install certificate’ and confirm with ‘OK’. Enable Wifi The first start may take a few minutes Campus App does not save the password, but Android WifiManager does. Website Switch map Directions to Categories to show News sources Only latest article Shows only the latest article. Otherwise all articles of the selected sources are shown. If activated, you will be able to join chat rooms, where you and your fellow students can discuss. Chat terms Terms must be accepted to use group chat! Please activate your public key first You joined the chat room! The chat room could not be joined The chat room could not be created Change view mode Anonymous Bug Reports Support the TCA team by sending anonymous bug reports which include: stack trace, logfile, Android version, app version and screen resolution. Edit Auto-join new lecture rooms If you subscribe to a new lecture, the app will automatically add you to the lecture’s chat room. A new version of the Campus App has been released on %s. Tap to download now. Help us to improve the Campus App. Send us an e-mail if you encounter a problem. debenz@uos.de Support us Campus App needs permission to access your calendar to be able to sync it with your campus calendar. Campus App needs permission to access your location to display useful information, e.g. the menus of cafeterias around you or timetables of your nearest MVV station. If you do not grant this permission, you will still be able to configure your location in the settings. Campus App needs permission to access your contacts to be able to add this person to your contacts. Grant Permission Cancel OK Published on: Chat is not setup properly, please rerun the wizard via the settings! More Information Event plan Please connect to internet in order to proceed the first app start card_transition in minutes at Fix eduroam Fix it now We have detected an insecure eduroam wifi configuration. You are subject to leaking information about you and your account. DNS Name is not set You have configured eduroam without specifying the home institution (e.g. @eduroam.de) in your username. This means that eduroam won\'t work when you\'re not on your campus. Anonymous Identity not correct
Transportation Usage Tap your favorite transportation lines to highlight them. Tap again to revert them back to normal. Please enter your password. It will not be saved.
Delete old eduroam profile Open Wi-Fi preferences Done The Wi-Fi profile has to be deleted because the app doesn’t have permission to overwrite configurations. Open the Wi-Fi preferences, select eduroam and then click Forget.
